column2: if yelp reviewed JUST the food
column3: I would've given Uchi 5 stars. However
column4: that's not the case. On the brightside
column5: the food is amazing. It's in a class of its own. The waitstaff for the seating inside and outside were amazingly helpful. The hostess
column7: was a complete and blithering idiot. My party was forced to wait 3 hours for her mistake that she would not admit to. According to the people who work there
column8: she's the manager of the hostesses and from the Uchi located in Austin and was working at the Houston location temporarily. Complete idiot
column9: words cannot express. She was condescending and pretentious. How does she have a job at all? What are the standards these days?
